TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Interaction extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含用于与对象、应用程序和系统交互的过程。

span.span: The module contains procedures used to interact with objects, applications, and systems.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模块支持运行其他程序、调用方法或属性、从计算机发出嘟嘟声的 Visual Basic 语言关键字和运行时库成员、提供命令行字符串、操作 COM 对象和控制对话框。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that run other programs, call a method or property, sound a beep from the computer, provide a command-line string, manipulate COM objects, and control dialog boxes. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `Shell` 函数运行用户指定的应用程序。The following example uses the `Shell` function to run an application specified by the user. 指定 作为第二个参数将以正常大小打开应用程序，并为其提供焦点。Specifying as the second argument opens the application in normal size and gives it the focus. ```vb Dim procID As Integer ' Run calculator. procID = Shell("C:\Windows\system32\calc.exe", AppWinStyle.NormalFocus) ```

span.span: Information and Interaction Summary
Keywords (Visual Basic)

summary.span: 激活已经正在运行的应用程序。

span.span: Activates an application that is already running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `AppActivate` 使应用程序的活动窗口处于焦点状态。You use `AppActivate` to bring an application's active window into focus. 您可能没有活动窗口的句柄或引用，甚至知道哪个窗口在给定时刻处于活动状态。You might not have a handle or a reference to the active window, or even know which window is active at a given moment. 在这种情况下，不能使用 方法。In such a case, you cannot use the method. `AppActivate` 函数将焦点更改为命名应用程序或窗口，但不影响它是最大化还是最小化。The `AppActivate` function changes the focus to the named application or window but does not affect whether it is maximized or minimized. 当用户执行某个操作来更改焦点或关闭窗口时，焦点将离开激活的应用程序窗口。Focus moves away from the activated application window when the user takes some action to change the focus or close the window. 您可以使用 `Shell` 函数启动应用程序并设置窗口样式。You can use the `Shell` function to start an application and set the window style. 如果使用 `Title` 参数，则 `AppActivate` 使用不区分大小写的比较，否则要求与标题栏的内容完全匹配。If you use the `Title` parameter, `AppActivate` uses a case-insensitive comparison but otherwise requires an exact match with the contents of the title bar. 它首先查找顶级窗口，然后遍历子窗口。It first looks through the top-level windows and then through the child windows. 如果找不到匹配项，则会引发 。If it cannot find a match, it throws an . 只能将 `AppActivate` 用于拥有 windows 的进程。You can use `AppActivate` only with processes that own windows. 大多数控制台应用程序不拥有窗口，这意味着它们不会出现在 `AppActivate` 搜索的进程列表中。Most console applications do not own windows, which means that they do not appear in the list of processes that `AppActivate` searches. 在控制台应用程序中运行时，系统会创建一个单独的进程来运行应用程序，并将输出返回到控制台进程。When running from a console application, the system creates a separate process to run the application and returns the output to the console process. 因此，当你请求当前进程 ID 时，将获取此单独进程的进程 ID，而不是控制台应用程序的进程 ID。Consequently, when you request the current process ID, you get the process ID of this separate process, rather than the console application's process ID. 在运行时，`AppActivate` 函数使用与 `Title` 或与 `ProcessId`匹配的进程 ID 激活任何正在运行的应用程序。At run time, the `AppActivate` function activates any running application with a title that matches `Title` or with a process ID that matches `ProcessId`. 如果没有完全匹配项，则会激活其标题字符串以 `Title` 结尾的任何应用程序。If there is no exact match, it activates any application whose title string ends with `Title`. 如果有多个名为 `Title` 的应用程序，`AppActivate` 函数将随意选择一个应用程序来激活。If there is more than one application named `Title`, the `AppActivate` function arbitrarily chooses one to activate. > [!NOTE] > `AppActivate` 函数要求在 级别 `UIPermission`，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下的执行。The `AppActivate` function requires `UIPermission` at the level, which may affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关更多信息，请参见。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例说明了 `AppActivate` 函数激活应用程序窗口的各种用法。This example illustrates various uses of the `AppActivate` function to activate an application window. 如果记事本进程未运行，则该示例会引发 。If a Notepad process is not running, the example throws an . `Shell` 过程假定应用程序位于指定的路径中。The `Shell` procedure assumes the applications are in the paths specified. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 通过计算机扬声器提示音。

span.span: Sounds a tone through the computer's speaker.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 嘟嘟声的音调和持续时间取决于您的硬件和系统软件，因此在不同的计算机之间有所不同。The pitch and duration of the beep depend on your hardware and system software and therefore vary among computers. > [!NOTE] > `Beep` 函数要求在 级别 `UIPermission`，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下的执行。The `Beep` function requires `UIPermission` at the level, which may affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用 `Beep` 函数通过计算机的扬声器发出音调。This example uses the `Beep` function to sound a tone through the computer's speaker. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#59](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#59)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时使用 `CallByName` 函数获取属性、设置属性或调用方法。The `CallByName` function is used at runtime to get a property, set a property, or invoke a method. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，第一行使用 `CallByName` 设置文本框的 `Text` 属性，第二行检索 `Text` 属性的值，第三行调用 `Move` 方法来移动该文本框。In the following example, the first line uses `CallByName` to set the `Text` property of a text box, the second line retrieves the value of the `Text` property, and the third line invokes the `Move` method to move the text box. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#99](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#99)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#20)] 下一个示例使用 `CallByName` 函数调用集合对象的 `Add` 和 `Item` 方法。The next example uses the `CallByName` function to invoke the `Add` and `Item` methods of a collection object. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

span.span: Selects and returns a value from a list of arguments.

returns.span: 从参数列表中选择和返回一个值。

span.span: Selects and returns a value from a list of arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Choose` 函数根据 `Index`的值返回 `Choice()`中传递的列表的成员。The `Choose` function returns a member of the list passed in `Choice()`, based on the value of `Index`. 当 `Index` 为1时，将选择列表的第一个成员。The first member of the list is selected when `Index` is 1. `Index` 为 `UBound`（`Choice()`）时，将选择列表的最后一个成员。The last member of the list is selected when `Index` is `UBound`(`Choice()`). 如果 `Index` 超出了这些限制，`Choose` 返回 `Nothing`。If `Index` is outside these limits, `Choose` returns `Nothing`. 如果 `Index` 不是整数，则在计算之前，将舍入为最接近的整数。If `Index` is not a whole number, it is rounded to the nearest whole number before being evaluated. 您可以使用 `Choose` 在可能的列表中查找值。You can use `Choose` to look up a value in a list of possibilities. > [!NOTE] > 自变量列表中的表达式可以包含函数调用。The expressions in the argument list can include function calls. 作为 `Choose` 调用的参数列表的一部分，Visual Basic 编译器将调用每个表达式中的每个函数。As part of preparing the argument list for the call to `Choose`, the Visual Basic compiler calls every function in every expression. 这意味着，如果 `Index` 选择了不同的表达式，则不能依赖于未调用的特定函数。This means that you cannot rely on a particular function not being called if a different expression is selected by `Index`. ## Examples 此示例使用 `Choose` 函数显示一个名称，以响应传递到 `Ind` 参数中的过程的索引。This example uses the `Choose` function to display a name in response to an index passed into the procedure in the `Ind` parameter. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#22)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回参数后，可以搜索常用分隔符（如空格、向后或正斜杠、连字符或引号），以拆分或搜索单独参数的字符串。After the arguments are returned, you can search for common delimiters, such as spaces, backward or forward slashes, hyphens, or quotation marks, to split or search the string for individual parameters. 对于使用 Visual Basic 开发并编译为 .exe 文件的应用程序，`Command` 函数返回命令行上应用程序名称后出现的所有参数，格式为： `MyApp(cmdlineargs)`。For applications developed with Visual Basic and compiled to an .exe file, the `Command` function returns any arguments that appear after the name of the application on the command line, in this form: `MyApp(cmdlineargs)`. ## Examples 此示例使用 `Command` 函数返回包含数组的对象中的命令行参数。This example uses the `Command` function to return the command-line arguments in an object that contains an array. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#58](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#58)]

summary.span: 创建并返回对 COM 对象的引用。

span.span: Creates and returns a reference to a COM object.

summary.span: 不能在 Visual Basic 中使用 创建这些类的实例，除非将类显式公开为 COM 组件。

span.span: cannot be used to create instances of classes in Visual Basic unless those classes are explicitly exposed as COM components.

returns.span: 创建并返回对 COM 对象的引用。

span.span: Creates and returns a reference to a COM object.

returns.span: 不能在 Visual Basic 中使用 创建这些类的实例，除非将类显式公开为 COM 组件。

span.span: cannot be used to create instances of classes in Visual Basic unless those classes are explicitly exposed as COM components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建 COM 组件的实例，请将 `CreateObject` 返回的对象分配给对象变量：To create an instance of a COM component, assign the object returned by `CreateObject` to an object variable: ```vb Sub CreateADODB() Dim adoApp As Object adoApp = CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") End Sub ``` 用于存储返回对象的对象变量的类型可能会影响应用程序的性能。The type of object variable you use to store the returned object can affect your application's performance. 使用 `As Object` 子句声明对象变量将创建一个变量，该变量可包含对任何类型的对象的引用。Declaring an object variable with the `As Object` clause creates a variable that can contain a reference to any type of object. 但是，通过该变量对对象的访问是*后期绑定*的，也就是说，在程序运行时将进行绑定。However, access to the object through that variable is *late-bound*, that is, the binding occurs when your program runs. 应避免后期绑定的原因有很多，包括应用程序性能下降。There are many reasons you should avoid late binding, including slower application performance. 你可以创建一个生成早期绑定的对象变量，即在编译程序时进行绑定。You can create an object variable that results in early binding - that is, binding when the program is compiled. 为此，请从 "**项目**" 菜单上的 "**添加引用**" 对话框的 " **COM** " 选项卡中为你的对象添加对类型库的引用。To do so, add a reference to the type library for your object from the **COM** tab of the **Add Reference** dialog box on the **Project** menu. 然后声明对象的特定类型的对象变量。Then declare the object variable of the specific type of your object. 在大多数情况下，使用 `Dim` 语句和主互操作程序集来创建对象比使用 `CreateObject` 函数更有效。In most cases, it is more efficient to use the `Dim` statement and a primary interop assembly to create objects than it is to use the `CreateObject` function. ## 与非托管代码交互Interacting with Unmanaged Code 另一个问题是，COM 对象使用非托管代码，而不是公共语言运行时的优点。Another issue is that COM objects use unmanaged code - code without the benefit of the common language runtime. 将 Visual Basic 的托管代码与 COM 中的非托管代码混合使用会产生相当大的复杂性。There is a fair degree of complexity involved in mixing the managed code of Visual Basic with unmanaged code from COM. 添加对 COM 对象的引用时，Visual Basic 会搜索该库的主互操作程序集（PIA）;如果找到一个，则使用它。When you add a reference to a COM object, Visual Basic searches for a primary interop assembly (PIA) for that library; if it finds one, then it uses it. 如果未找到 PIA，则会创建一个互操作性程序集，该程序集包含 COM 库中每个类的本地互操作性类。If it does not find a PIA, then it creates an interoperability assembly that contains local interoperability classes for each class in the COM library. 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 应用程序中的 COM 互操作性](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/com-interoperability-in-net-framework-applications.md)。For more information, see [COM Interoperability in .NET Framework Applications](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/com-interoperability-in-net-framework-applications.md). 通常应尽可能使用强绑定对象和主互操作程序集。You should generally use strongly bound objects and primary interop assemblies whenever possible. 下面的示例将 `CreateObject` 函数与 Microsoft Office 对象结合使用，以便仅用于演示目的。The examples below use the `CreateObject` function with Microsoft Office objects for demonstration purposes only. 但是，在与相应的主互操作程序集一起使用时，这些对象更易于使用且更可靠。However, these objects are easier to use and more reliable when used with the appropriate primary interop assembly. ## 在远程计算机上创建对象Creating an Object on a Remote Computer 您可以通过将计算机名称传递到 `CreateObject` 函数的 `ServerName` 参数，在远程网络计算机上创建对象。You can create an object on a remote networked computer by passing the name of the computer to the `ServerName` argument of the `CreateObject` function. 该名称与共享名称的计算机名称部分相同：对于名为 "\\\MyServer\Public" 的共享，"`ServerName` 为" MyServer "。That name is the same as the Machine Name portion of a share name: for a share named "\\\MyServer\Public," `ServerName` is "MyServer." > [!NOTE] > 有关使应用程序在远程联网计算机上可访问的其他信息，请参阅 COM 文档（请参阅 Microsoft 开发人员网络）。Refer to COM documentation (see Microsoft Developer Network) for additional information on making an application accessible on a remote networked computer. 可能需要为应用程序添加注册表项。You may need to add a registry key for your application. 下面的代码返回在名为 `MyServer` 的远程计算机上运行的 Excel 实例的版本号：The following code returns the version number of an instance of Excel running on a remote computer named `MyServer`: ```vb Sub CreateRemoteExcelObj() Dim xlApp As Object ' Replace string "\\MyServer" with name of the remote computer. xlApp = CreateObject("Excel.Application", "\\MyServer") MsgBox(xlApp.Version) End Sub ``` 如果远程服务器名称不正确或不可用，则会发生运行时错误。If the remote server name is incorrect, or if it is unavailable, a run-time error occurs. > [!NOTE] > 如果没有对象的当前实例，请使用 `CreateObject`。Use `CreateObject` when there is no current instance of the object. 如果对象实例已在运行，则将启动一个新实例，并创建一个指定类型的对象。If an instance of the object is already running, a new instance is started, and an object of the specified type is created. 若要使用当前实例，或要启动应用程序并将文件加载，请使用 `GetObject` 函数。To use the current instance, or to start the application and have it load a file, use the `GetObject` function. 如果对象已将自身注册为单实例对象，则只会创建对象的一个实例，无论执行了多少次 `CreateObject`。If an object has registered itself as a single-instance object, only one instance of the object is created, no matter how many times `CreateObject` is executed. ## 创建框架对象Creating Framework Objects 只能使用 `CreateObject` 函数来创建 COM 对象。You can use the `CreateObject` function only to create a COM object. 尽管没有用于创建 .NET Framework 对象的完全等效机制， 命名空间中的 包含创建本地或远程对象的方法。While there is no exact equivalent mechanism for creating a .NET Framework object, the in the namespace contains methods to create local or remote objects. 具体而言， 方法或 方法可能会很有用。In particular, the method or the method might be useful. > [!IMPORTANT] > `CreateObject` 函数需要非托管代码权限，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下的执行。The `CreateObject` function requires unmanaged code permission, which might affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `CreateObject` 函数创建 Microsoft Excel 工作表，并将该工作表保存到文件。The following example uses the `CreateObject` function to create a Microsoft Excel worksheet and saves the worksheet to a file. 若要使用此示例，必须将 Excel 安装在运行此程序的计算机上。To use this example, Excel must be installed on the computer where this program runs. 此外，你必须从 "**项目**" 菜单上的 "**添加引用**" 对话框的 " **COM** " 选项卡中添加对类型库的引用。Also, you must add a reference to the type library from the **COM** tab of the **Add Reference** dialog box on the **Project** menu. 类型库的名称因计算机上安装的 Excel 的版本而异。The name of the type library varies depending on the version of Excel installed on your computer. 例如，Microsoft Excel 2002 的类型库命名为 " **Microsoft excel 10.0 对象库**"。For example, the type library for Microsoft Excel 2002 is named **Microsoft Excel 10.0 Object Library**. [!code-vb[VbVbalrExcelObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrExcelObject/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果提供所有参数，则将删除指定的设置。If all arguments are provided, the specified setting is deleted. 如果尝试对不存在的节或键设置使用 `DeleteSetting`，则会发生运行时错误。A run-time error occurs if you attempt to use `DeleteSetting` on a nonexistent section or key setting. `DeleteSetting` 要求用户登录，因为它在用户以交互方式登录之前处于不活动状态的 `HKEY_LOCAL_USER` 注册表项下运行。`DeleteSetting` requires that a user be logged on since it operates under the `HKEY_LOCAL_USER` registry key, which is not active until a user logs on interactively. 要从非交互式进程（如 Mtx.exe）访问的注册表设置应存储在 `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\` 或 `HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software` 注册表项下。Registry settings that are to be accessed from a non-interactive process (such as Mtx.exe) should be stored under either the `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\` or the `HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software` registry keys. ## Examples 下面的示例首先使用 `SaveSetting` 过程为 `MyApp` 应用程序的 Windows 注册表中的条目，然后使用 `DeleteSetting` 函数将它们删除。The following example first uses the `SaveSetting` procedure to make entries in the Windows registry for the `MyApp` application, and then uses the `DeleteSetting` function to remove them. 由于未指定 `Key` 参数，将删除整个 `Startup` 部分，其中包括节名称及其所有键。Because no `Key` argument is specified, the whole `Startup` section is deleted, including the section name and all of its keys. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `Expression` 包含一个字符串，则 函数将返回分配给指定环境字符串的文本，即该环境变量的环境字符串表中等号（=）后的文本。If `Expression` contains a string, the function returns the text assigned to the specified environment string - that is, the text following the equal sign (=) in the environment-string table for that environment variable. 如果在环境字符串表中找不到 `Expression` 中的字符串，则返回长度为零的字符串（""）。If the string in `Expression` cannot be found in the environment-string table, a zero-length string ("") is returned. 如果 `Expression` 包含一个整数，则会返回占用环境字符串表中该数值位置的字符串。If `Expression` contains an integer, the string occupying that numeric position in the environment-string table is returned. 在这种情况下， 返回所有文本，包括环境变量的名称。In this case, returns all of the text, including the name of the environment variable. 如果指定位置没有环境字符串， 返回一个长度为零的字符串。If there is no environment string in the specified position, returns a zero-length string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 函数需要环境权限，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下的执行。The function requires environment permission, which might affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). ## Examples 此示例使用 函数提供环境字符串表中的 `PATH` 语句的输入编号和长度。This example uses the function to supply the entry number and length of the `PATH` statement from the environment-string table. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#28)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `AppName` 或 `Section` 不存在，`GetAllSettings` 将返回未初始化的 `Object`。`GetAllSettings` returns an uninitialized `Object` if either `AppName` or `Section` does not exist. 由于它在用户以交互方式登录之前处于不活动状态的 `HKEY_LOCAL_USER` 注册表项下运行，因此 `GetAllSettings` 需要用户登录。Because it operates under the `HKEY_LOCAL_USER` registry key, which is not active until a user logs on interactively, `GetAllSettings` requires that a user be logged on. 要从非交互式进程（如 Mtx.exe）访问的注册表设置应存储在 `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\` 或 `HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software` 注册表项下。Registry settings that are to be accessed from a non-interactive process (such as Mtx.exe) should be stored under either the `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\` or the `HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software` registry keys. ## Examples 此示例首先使用 `SaveSetting` 函数为指定为 `AppName`的应用程序的 Windows 注册表中的条目，然后使用 `GetAllSettings` 函数显示设置。This example first uses the `SaveSetting` function to make entries in the Windows registry for the application specified as `AppName`, then uses the `GetAllSettings` function to display the settings. 请注意，不能通过 `GetAllSettings`检索应用程序名称和 `Section` 名称。Note that application names and `Section` names cannot be retrieved with `GetAllSettings`. 最后，`DeleteSetting` 函数会删除应用程序的条目。Finally, the `DeleteSetting` function removes the application's entries. span.span: A reference to an object provided by a COM component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `GetObject` 函数从文件中加载 COM 组件的实例。Use the `GetObject` function to load an instance of a COM component from a file. 下面的示例阐释了这一点。The following example illustrates this. ```vb Dim CADObject As Object CADObject = GetObject("C:\CAD\schema.cad") ``` 此代码运行时，将启动与指定 `PathName` 关联的应用程序，并激活指定文件中的对象。When this code runs, the application associated with the specified `PathName` is started and the object in the specified file is activated. ## 默认情况Default Cases 如果 `PathName` 是长度为零的字符串（`""`），则 `GetObject` 返回指定类类型的新对象实例。If `PathName` is a zero-length string (`""`), `GetObject` returns a new object instance of the specified class type. 如果省略 `PathName` 参数，则 `GetObject` 返回 `Class`中指定的类类型的当前活动对象。If the `PathName` argument is omitted, `GetObject` returns a currently active object of the class type specified in `Class`. 如果不存在指定类型的对象，则会发生错误。If no object of the specified type exists, an error occurs. ## 访问子对象Accessing a Subobject 某些应用程序允许你激活与文件关联的子对象。Some applications allow you to activate a subobject associated with a file. 为此，请将感叹号（`!`）添加到文件名的末尾，并在文件名后跟一个字符串，该字符串标识要激活的文件部分。To do this, add an exclamation point (`!`) to the end of the file name and follow it with a string that identifies the part of the file you want to activate. 有关如何创建此字符串的信息，请参阅创建对象的应用程序的文档。For information on how to create this string, see the documentation for the application that created the object. 例如，在绘图应用程序中，可能有多个层用于存储在文件中的绘图。For example, in a drawing application you might have multiple layers to a drawing stored in a file. 你可以使用以下代码在名为 `schema.cad` 的绘图中激活层。You could use the following code to activate a layer within a drawing called `schema.cad`. ```vb layerObject = GetObject("C:\CAD\schema.cad!Layer3") ``` ## 指定类Specifying a Class 如果未指定对象的 `Class`，则自动化将根据你提供的文件名确定要启动的应用程序和要激活的对象。If you do not specify the object's `Class`, Automation determines the application to start and the object to activate, based on the file name you provide. 但是，某些文件可以支持多个对象类。Some files, however, can support more than one class of object. 例如，绘制可能支持三种不同类型的对象：一个 `Application` 对象、一个 `Drawing` 对象和一个 `Toolbar` 对象，这些对象都属于同一文件。For example, a drawing might support three different types of objects: an `Application` object, a `Drawing` object, and a `Toolbar` object, all of which are part of the same file. 若要指定要激活的文件中的哪个对象，请使用可选的 `Class` 参数。To specify which object in a file you want to activate, use the optional `Class` argument. 下面的示例阐释了这一点。The following example illustrates this. ```vb Dim drawObj As Object drawObj = GetObject("C:\Drawings\sample.drw", "Figment.Drawing") ``` 在前面的示例中，`Figment` 是绘图应用程序的名称，`Drawing` 是它支持的对象类型之一。In the preceding example, `Figment` is the name of a drawing application and `Drawing` is one of the object types it supports. ## 使用对象Using the Object 激活某个对象后，可以使用声明的对象变量在代码中引用该对象。Once an object is activated, you refer to it in code using the object variable you declared. 在前面的示例中，使用对象变量 `drawObj` 访问新对象的属性和方法。In the preceding example, you access properties and methods of the new object using the object variable `drawObj`. 下面的示例阐释了这一点。The following example illustrates this. ```vb drawObj.Line(9, 90) drawObj.InsertText(9, 100, "Hello, world.") drawObj.SaveAs("C:\Drawings\sample.drw") ``` > [!NOTE] > 当存在对象的当前实例时，或者如果要使用加载的文件创建对象，请使用 `GetObject` 函数。Use the `GetObject` function when there is a current instance of the object or if you want to create the object with a file loaded. 如果没有当前实例，并且你不希望在加载文件的情况下启动对象，请使用 函数。If there is no current instance, and you do not want the object started with a file loaded, use the function. > > 如果对象已将自身注册为 ActiveX 单实例对象，则仅创建对象的一个实例，无论调用多少次 `CreateObject`。If an object has registered itself as an ActiveX single-instance object, only one instance of the object is created, no matter how many times `CreateObject` is called. 对于单实例对象，`GetObject` 在使用零长度字符串（`""`）语法调用时始终返回相同的实例，如果省略 `PathName` 参数，则会导致错误。With a single-instance object, `GetObject` always returns the same instance when called with the zero-length string (`""`) syntax, and it causes an error if the `PathName` argument is omitted. 不能使用 `GetObject` 获取对使用 Visual Basic 创建的类的引用。You cannot use `GetObject` to obtain a reference to a class created with Visual Basic. > [!IMPORTANT] > `GetObject` 函数需要非托管代码权限，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下的执行。The `GetObject` function requires unmanaged code permission, which might affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `GetObject` 函数获取对特定 Microsoft Excel 工作表的引用（`excelObj`）。The following example uses the `GetObject` function to obtain a reference to a specific Microsoft Excel worksheet (`excelObj`). 它使用工作表的 `Application` 属性使 Excel 可见，将其关闭，然后执行其他操作。It uses the worksheet's `Application` property to make Excel visible, to close it, and to perform other actions. 使用两个 API 调用时，`detectExcel` 过程将查找 Excel，如果正在运行，则将其输入到正在运行的对象表中。Using two API calls, the `detectExcel` procedure looks for Excel, and if it is running, enters it in the Running Object table. 如果 Excel 尚未运行，则第一次调用 `GetObject` 会导致错误，在此示例中，将 `excelWasNotRunning` 标志设置为 `True`。The first call to `GetObject` causes an error if Excel is not already running, which in this example causes the `excelWasNotRunning` flag to be set to `True`. 对 `GetObject` 的第二次调用指定要打开的文件。The second call to `GetObject` specifies a file to open. 如果 Excel 尚未运行，则第二次调用将启动它并返回对由指定的文件（`test.xls`）表示的工作表的引用。If Excel is not already running, the second call starts it and returns a reference to the worksheet represented by the specified file, `test.xls`. 文件必须存在于指定的位置;否则，Visual Basic 会引发 。The file must exist in the specified location; otherwise, Visual Basic throws a . 接下来，示例代码使 Excel 和包含指定工作表的窗口可见。Next, the example code makes both Excel and the window containing the specified worksheet visible. 此示例需要 `Option Strict Off`，因为它使用后期绑定，其中对象被分配到类型 `Object`的变量中。This example requires `Option Strict Off` because it uses late binding, where objects are assigned to variables of type `Object`. 如果从 Visual Studio 的 "**项目**" 菜单的 "**添加引用**" 对话框的 " **COM** " 选项卡中添加对 Excel 类型库的引用，则可以指定 `Option Strict On` 和声明特定对象类型的对象。You can specify `Option Strict On` and declare objects of specific object types if you add a reference to the Excel type library from the **COM** tab of the **Add Reference** dialog box of the **Project** menu in Visual Studio. [!code-vb[VbVbalrExcelObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrExcelObject/VB/Class1.vb#2)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrExcelObject#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrExcelObject/VB/Class1.vb#4)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrExcelObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrExcelObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 调用 `getExcel` 函数时，会进行检查以查看 Excel 是否已在运行。When you call the `getExcel` function, a check is made to see if Excel is already running. 如果不是，则创建实例。If it is not, then an instance is created. > [!IMPORTANT] > 为简单起见，前面的示例假定名为 `XLMAIN` 的任何窗口都属于 Microsoft Excel 的实例。For simplicity, the preceding example assumes that any window called `XLMAIN` belongs to an instance of Microsoft Excel. 如果另一个对象（可能由非法篡改来启动）使用该名称创建了一个窗口，则它将接收你打算用于 Excel 的所有消息。If another object, possibly launched by illicit tampering, created a window with that name, it would receive all the messages you intended for Excel. 在要用于生产的应用程序中，应包括一些更严格的测试，以验证 `XLMAIN` 确实属于 Excel。In an application to be used for production, you should include some more rigorous testing to verify that `XLMAIN` really belongs to Excel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `GetSetting` 参数中命名的任何项不存在，`GetSetting` 返回值 `Default`。If any of the items named in the `GetSetting` arguments do not exist, `GetSetting` returns a value of `Default`. 由于它在用户以交互方式登录之前处于不活动状态的 `HKEY_LOCAL_USER` 注册表项下运行，因此 `GetSetting` 需要用户登录。Because it operates under the `HKEY_LOCAL_USER` registry key, which is not active until a user logs on interactively, `GetSetting` requires that a user be logged on. 要从非交互式进程（如 Mtx.exe）访问的注册表设置应存储在 `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\` 或 `HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software` 注册表项下。Registry settings that are to be accessed from a non-interactive process (such as Mtx.exe) should be stored under either the `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\` or the `HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software` registry keys. `GetSetting` 要求 `Read`。`GetSetting` requires `Read` . ## Examples 此示例首先使用 `SaveSetting` 函数为指定为 `AppName`的应用程序的 Windows 注册表中的条目，然后使用 `GetSetting` 函数显示其中一项设置。This example first uses the `SaveSetting` function to make entries in the Windows registry for the application specified as `AppName`, and then uses the `GetSetting` function to display one of the settings. 由于指定了 `Default` 参数，因此保证返回某些值。Because the `Default` argument is specified, some value is guaranteed to be returned. 请注意，不能 `GetSetting`检索 `Section` 名称。Notice that `Section` names cannot be retrieved with `GetSetting`. 最后，`DeleteSetting` 函数将删除应用程序的所有条目。Finally, the `DeleteSetting` function removes all the application's entries. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#61](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#61)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IIf` 函数为 Visual C++中的三元[条件运算符：？：](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88643ee8-7100-4f86-880a-705ec22b6271)提供对应项。The `IIf` function provides a counterpart for the ternary [Conditional Operator: ? :](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88643ee8-7100-4f86-880a-705ec22b6271) in Visual C++. ## Examples 此示例使用 `IIf` 函数来计算 `checkIt` 过程的 `testMe` 参数，如果该数量大于1000，则返回 "大" 一词。否则，它将返回 "Small" 一词。This example uses the `IIf` function to evaluate the `testMe` parameter of the `checkIt` procedure and returns the word "Large" if the amount is greater than 1000; otherwise, it returns the word "Small". [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#33)] 请注意，如果 `On``Option Strict`，则必须使用 `CStr` 关键字将返回从 `Object` 显式转换为 `String`。Note that if `Option Strict` is `On`, you must use the `CStr` keyword to explicitly convert the return from `Object` to `String`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户单击 "**取消**"，则返回一个长度为零的字符串。If the user clicks **Cancel**, a zero-length string is returned. 若要指定除第一个参数以外的其他参数，必须在表达式中使用 `InputBox` 函数。To specify more than the first argument, you must use the `InputBox` function in an expression. 如果省略任何位置参数，则必须保留相应的逗号分隔符。If you omit any positional arguments, you must retain the corresponding comma delimiter. > [!NOTE] > `InputBox` 函数要求在 级别 `UIPermission`，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下的执行。The `InputBox` function requires `UIPermission` at the level, which may affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅[请求权限](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/yd267cce(v%3dvs.100))和 。For more information, see [Requesting Permissions](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/yd267cce(v%3dvs.100)) and . ## Examples 此示例显示使用 `InputBox` 函数提示用户输入值的各种方式。This example shows various ways to use the `InputBox` function to prompt the user to enter a value. 如果省略 x 和 y 位置，则对话框将自动居中放置在各自的轴上。If the x and y positions are omitted, the dialog box is automatically centered for the respective axes. 如果用户单击 "确定" 或按 ENTER 键，则变量 `MyValue` 包含用户输入的值。The variable `MyValue` contains the value entered by the user if the user clicks OK or presses the ENTER key. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果省略任何位置参数，则必须保留相应的逗号分隔符。If you omit any positional arguments, you must retain the corresponding comma delimiter. 如果对话框显示 **“取消”** 按钮，则按 Esc 键的效果与单击 **“取消”** 的效果相同。If the dialog box displays a **Cancel** button, pressing the ESC key has the same effect as clicking **Cancel** 如果对话框包含 "**帮助**" 按钮，则会为该对话框提供上下文相关帮助。If the dialog box contains a **Help** button, context-sensitive Help is provided for the dialog box. 但是，在关闭其他任一按钮前，不会返回任何值。However, no value is returned until one of the other buttons is chosen. 在 Windows 窗体应用程序中，选择 **“帮助”** 按钮将对该窗体执行 事件。In Windows Form applications, choosing the **Help** button executes the event for the form. > [!NOTE] > `MsgBox` 函数要求在 级别 `UIPermission`，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下的执行。The `MsgBox` function requires `UIPermission` at the level, which may affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 下表列出了 `MsgBoxStyle` 枚举值。The `MsgBoxStyle` enumeration values are listed in the following table. |成员Member|值Value|说明Description| |-|-|-| |成员Member|值Value|说明Description| |`OKOnly`|00|仅显示 "确定" 按钮。Displays OK button only.| |`OKCancel`|11|显示 "确定" 和 "取消" 按钮。Displays OK and Cancel buttons.| |`AbortRetryIgnore`|22|显示 "中止"、"重试" 和 "忽略" 按钮。Displays Abort, Retry, and Ignore buttons.| |`YesNoCancel`|33|显示 "是"、"否" 和 "取消" 按钮。Displays Yes, No, and Cancel buttons.| |`YesNo`|44|显示 "是" 和 "否" 按钮。Displays Yes and No buttons.| |`RetryCancel`|55|显示 "重试" 和 "取消" 按钮。Displays Retry and Cancel buttons.| |`Critical`|1616|显示关键消息图标。Displays Critical Message icon.| |`Question`|3232|显示警告查询图标。Displays Warning Query icon.| |`Exclamation`|4848|显示警告消息图标。Displays Warning Message icon.| |`Information`|6464|显示信息消息图标。Displays Information Message icon.| |`DefaultButton1`|00|第一个按钮是默认值。First button is default.| |`DefaultButton2`|256256|第二个按钮是默认值。Second button is default.| |`DefaultButton3`|512512|第三个按钮是默认值。Third button is default.| |`ApplicationModal`|00|应用程序是模式的。Application is modal. 在当前应用程序中继续工作之前，用户必须响应该消息框。The user must respond to the message box before continuing work in the current application.| |`SystemModal`|40964096|系统是模式的。System is modal. 所有应用程序都将挂起，直到用户响应消息框。All applications are suspended until the user responds to the message box.| |`MsgBoxSetForeground`|6553665536|指定消息框窗口作为前台窗口。Specifies the message box window as the foreground window.| |`MsgBoxRight`|524288524288|文本右对齐。Text is right-aligned.| |`MsgBoxRtlReading`|10485761048576|指定文本在希伯来语和阿拉伯语系统中应显示为从右到左阅读。Specifies text should appear as right-to-left reading on Hebrew and Arabic systems.| 第一组值（0-5）描述对话框中显示的按钮的数量和类型。The first group of values (0-5) describes the number and type of buttons displayed in the dialog box. 第二组（16，32，48，64）描述了图标样式。The second group (16, 32, 48, 64) describes the icon style. 第三组（0，256，512）确定默认的按钮。The third group (0, 256, 512) determines which button is the default. 第四组（0，4096）确定消息框的模态，第五组指定消息框窗口是否为前景窗口，以及文本的对齐方式和方向。The fourth group (0, 4096) determines the modality of the message box, and the fifth group specifies whether or not the message box window is the foreground window, along with the alignment and direction of the text. 在添加数字以为 `Buttons` 参数创建最终值时，每个组只使用一个编号。When adding numbers to create a final value for the `Buttons` argument, use only one number from each group. ## Examples 此示例使用 `MsgBox` 函数在包含 "是" 和 "否" 按钮的对话框中显示严重错误消息。This example uses the `MsgBox` function to display a critical-error message in a dialog box with Yes and No buttons. "否" 按钮指定为默认响应。The No button is specified as the default response. 这是通过将 `MsgBox` 常数值组合成一个数值表达式来完成的。This is done by combining the `MsgBox` constant values into one numeric expression. 在这种情况下，将添加4（是/否按钮组合）和16（"**关键消息**" 窗口）和 "256" （第二个按钮作为默认按钮），总共为276。In this case, adding 4 (the Yes/No button combination) and 16 (the **Critical Message** window) and 256 (the second button as default button) gives a total of 276. `MsgBox` 函数返回的值取决于用户选择的按钮： Yes 返回值 6;No 返回值7。The value returned by the `MsgBox` function depends on the button chosen by the user: Yes returns a value of 6; No returns a value of 7. remarks.format: ## Remarks `Partition` 函数计算一组数值范围，其中每个数值范围包含 `Interval`指定的值的数目。The `Partition` function calculates a set of numeric ranges, each containing the number of values specified by `Interval`. 第一个范围从 `Start`开始，最后一个范围以 `Stop`结束。The first range begins at `Start`, and the last range ends at `Stop`. 然后 `Partition` 函数标识包含 `Number` 的范围，并返回描述该范围的字符串。The `Partition` function then identifies which range contains `Number` and returns a string describing that range. 范围在字符串中表示为 "*lowervalue*：*uppervalue*"，其中范围的低端（*lowervalue*）通过冒号（:) 与高端（*uppervalue*）隔开。The range is represented in the string as "*lowervalue*:*uppervalue*", where the low end of the range (*lowervalue*) is separated from the high end (*uppervalue*) by a colon (:). 如有必要，`Partition` 函数将在*lowervalue*和*uppervalue*之前插入前导空格，以便它们与值的字符串表示形式具有相同的字符数（`Stop` + 1）。If necessary, the `Partition` function inserts leading spaces before *lowervalue* and *uppervalue* so that they both have the same number of characters as the string representation of the value (`Stop` + 1). 这可以确保如果将 `Partition` 函数的输出用于多个 `Number`的值，则在执行任何后续排序操作时，将正确处理生成的文本。This ensures that if you use the output of the `Partition` function with several values of `Number`, the resulting text will be handled properly during any subsequent sort operation. 下表显示了使用三组 `Start`、`Stop` 和 `Interval` 来计算的范围的示例字符串。The following table shows some sample strings for ranges calculated using three sets of `Start`, `Stop`, and `Interval`. "第一个范围" 和 "最后一个范围" 列显示 `Start` 和 `Stop`的值可能的最小和最大范围。The "First range" and "Last range" columns show the lowest and highest ranges possible given the values of `Start` and `Stop`. "第一个范围之前" 和 "最后一范围之后" 列显示 `Number` 小于 `Start` 的值和大于 `Stop`的值返回的字符串。The "Before first range" and "After last range" columns show the strings returned for values of `Number` less than `Start` and greater than `Stop`, respectively. |`Start`|`Stop`|`Interval`|在第一个范围之前Before first range|第一个范围First range|最后一个范围Last range|最后一个范围之后After last range| |-|-|-|-|-|-|-| |00|9999|55|"：-1"" : -1"|"0: 4"" 0: 4"|"95： 99"" 95: 99"|"100：""100: "| |2020|199199|1010|"： 19"" : 19"|"20:29"" 20: 29"|"190:199""190:199"|"200：""200: "| |100100|10101010|2020|"： 99"" : 99"|"100： 119"" 100: 119"|"1000:1010""1000:1010"|"1011：""1011: "| 在上表中，如果 `Start` 和 `Stop` 定义一组不能按 `Interval`平均分割的数字，则第三行显示结果。In the preceding table, the third line shows the result when `Start` and `Stop` define a set of numbers that cannot be evenly divided by `Interval`. 最后一个范围的结束时间为 `Stop`，即使 `Interval` 为20，也只会使它的长度超过11个数字。The last range ends at `Stop`, making it only 11 numbers long, even though `Interval` is 20. 如果 `Interval` 为1，则该范围为 "`Number`：`Number`"，与 `Start` 和 `Stop` 参数无关。If `Interval` is 1, the range is "`Number`:`Number`", regardless of the `Start` and `Stop` arguments. 例如，如果 `Number` 为267，`Stop` 为1000，`Interval` 为1，则 `Partition` 返回 "267： 267"。For example, if `Number` is 267, `Stop` is 1000, and `Interval` is 1, `Partition` returns " 267: 267". 构造数据库查询时，`Partition` 会很有用。`Partition` can be useful when constructing database queries. 您可以创建一个选择查询，用于显示在各种值范围内发生的订单数，例如，发票值介于1到1000、1001到2000等。You can create a SELECT query that shows how many orders occur within various value ranges, for example with invoice values from 1 to 1000, 1001 to 2000, and so on. ## Examples 下面的示例设置从1950到2049的数十系列范围。The following example sets up a series of ranges for decades from 1950 through 2049. 它在适当范围内查找 `year` 的值，并返回显示该范围的 `String` 值。It locates the value of `year` within the appropriate range and returns a `String` value showing the range. 例如，如果 `year` 的值为1984，则 `Partition` 返回 "1980:1989"。If `year` has a value of 1984, for example, `Partition` returns "1980:1989". [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#45)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SaveSetting` 函数将键添加到 `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\VB and VBA Program Settings`中。The `SaveSetting` function adds the key to `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\VB and VBA Program Settings`. 如果由于任何原因而无法保存密钥设置，则会发生错误。If the key setting cannot be saved for any reason, an error occurs. `SaveSetting` 要求用户登录，因为它在用户以交互方式登录之前处于不活动状态的 `HKEY_LOCAL_USER` 注册表项下运行。`SaveSetting` requires that a user be logged on since it operates under the `HKEY_LOCAL_USER` registry key, which is not active until a user logs on interactively. 要从非交互式进程（如 Mtx.exe）访问的注册表设置应存储在 `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\` 或 `HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software` 注册表项下。Registry settings that are to be accessed from a non-interactive process (such as Mtx.exe) should be stored under either the `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\` or the `HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software` registry keys. `SaveSetting` 要求 `Write` 并 `Create`。`SaveSetting` requires `Write` and `Create` . ## Examples 下面的示例首先使用 `SaveSetting` 函数为 `MyApp` 应用程序的 Windows 注册表中的条目，然后使用 `DeleteSetting` 函数将它们删除。The following example first uses the `SaveSetting` function to make entries in the Windows registry for the `MyApp` application, and then uses the `DeleteSetting` function to remove them. remarks.format: ## Remarks `Shell` 函数的返回值取决于 `Shell` 返回时是否仍在执行 `PathName` 中指定的程序。The return value of the `Shell` function depends on whether the program named in `PathName` is still executing when `Shell` returns. 如果将 `Wait` 设置为 `True`，并且程序在超时过期之前完成，则 `Shell` 返回零。If you set `Wait` to `True` and the program finishes before the timeout expires, `Shell` returns zero. 如果超时时间已到，或者省略 `Wait` 或将其设置为 `False`，则 `Shell` 返回程序的进程 ID。If the timeout expires, or if you omit `Wait` or set it to `False`, `Shell` returns the process ID of the program. 进程 ID 是一个唯一的编号，用于标识正在运行的程序。The process ID is a unique number that identifies the running program. ## 未能启动Failure to Start 如果 `Shell` 函数无法启动命名程序，则会发生 错误。If the `Shell` function cannot start the named program, a error occurs. 例如，当你尝试从使用 的应用程序运行16位程序（例如 `command.com`）时，可能会发生这种情况。This can happen, for example, when you attempt to run a 16-bit program, such as `command.com`, from an application using . 为解决此问题，你可以运行一个调用所需的16位程序的32位程序。For a workaround, you can run a 32-bit program that calls the desired 16-bit program. 如果是 `command.com`，则可以将 `cmd.exe` 作为替代方法来运行。In the case of `command.com`, you can run `cmd.exe` as an alternative. ## 等待完成Waiting for Completion 默认情况下，`Shell` 函数以异步方式运行程序。By default, the `Shell` function runs the program asynchronously. 这意味着在执行 `Shell` 函数之后的语句之前，使用 `Shell` 函数启动的程序可能无法完成执行。This means that a program started with the `Shell` function might not finish executing before the statements following the `Shell` function are executed. 如果希望在继续操作之前等待程序完成，请将 `Wait` 设置为 `True`。If you want to wait for the program to finish before you continue, set `Wait` to `True`. ## 确定退出代码Determining the Exit Code 进程在终止时可以返回*退出代码*。A process can return an *exit code* when it terminates. 但是，你不能使用 `Shell` 来检索此退出代码，因为 `Shell` 在等待终止时返回零，同时也因为进程在不同于 `Shell`的对象中运行。However, you cannot use `Shell` to retrieve this exit code, because `Shell` returns zero if it waits for termination, and also because the process runs in a different object from `Shell`. 若要从进程中检索退出代码，你必须编写自己的代码来启动进程并等待终止。To retrieve the exit code from a process, you must write your own code to initiate the process and wait for termination. 下面的示例演示如何启动进程，等待它终止，并检索其退出代码。The following example shows how to initiate a process, wait for it to terminate, and retrieve its exit code. ```vb Dim procID As Integer Dim newProc As Diagnostics.Process newProc = Diagnostics.Process.Start("C:\WINDOWS\NOTEPAD.EXE") procID = newProc.Id newProc.WaitForExit() Dim procEC As Integer = -1 If newProc.HasExited Then procEC = newProc.ExitCode End If MsgBox("Process with ID " & CStr(ProcID) & _ " terminated with exit code " & CStr(procEC)) ``` ## 保护文件规范Protecting the File Specification 应始终将整个路径和文件规范括在引号中，如下面的示例所示。You should always enclose the entire path and file specification in quotation marks, as the following example shows. ```vb ID = Shell("""C:\Program Files\display.exe"" -a -q", , True, 100000) ``` 字符串文本中的每对相邻双引号（`" "`）被解释为字符串中的一个双引号字符。Each pair of adjacent double quotation marks (`" "`) within the string literal is interpreted as one double quotation character in the string. 因此，前面的示例向 `Shell` 函数提供以下字符串：Therefore, the preceding example presents the following string to the `Shell` function: ```console "C:\Program Files\display.exe" -a -q ``` 如果没有用引号引起来的路径，Windows 将在 C：\ 中查找名为 `Program.exe` 的文件目录，而不是在 C:\Program Files 目录中 `display.exe`。If you did not have the path enclosed in quotation marks, Windows would look for a file called `Program.exe` in the C:\ directory, instead of `display.exe` in the C:\Program Files directory. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果未将路径和文件规范括在引号中，则如果文件名或路径节点包含空格，则会产生安全风险。If you do not enclose the path and file specification in quotation marks, there is a security risk if the file name or a path node contains spaces. 在前面的示例中，路径节点 `\Program Files` 包括空格。In the preceding example, the path node `\Program Files` includes a space. 如果规范不在引号内并且已在 C： \\ 中安装了名为 `Program.exe` 的程序，例如，违法篡改，则 Windows 将执行它，而不是 `display.exe`。If the specification were not inside quotation marks and a program named `Program.exe` had been installed in C:\\, for example by illicit tampering, Windows would execute it instead of `display.exe`. > [!IMPORTANT] > `Shell` 函数需要非托管代码权限，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下的执行。The `Shell` function requires unmanaged code permission, which might affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `Shell` 函数运行用户指定的应用程序。The following example uses the `Shell` function to run an application specified by the user. 指定 作为第二个参数将以正常大小打开应用程序，并为其提供焦点。Specifying as the second argument opens the application in normal size and gives it the focus. remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供给 `VarExpr` 的参数由成对的表达式和值组成。The argument supplied to `VarExpr` consists of paired expressions and values. `Switch` 函数将从 `VarExpr`中的最低索引到最高索引计算奇数表达式，并返回与计算结果为 `True`的第一个表达式相关联的偶数值。The `Switch` function evaluates the odd-numbered expressions from lowest to highest index in `VarExpr`, and returns the even-numbered value associated with the first expression that evaluates to `True`. 例如，如果 `True``VarExpr(0)`，则 `Switch` 返回 `VarExpr(1)`，如果 `VarExpr(0)` `False` `VarExpr(2)` `True`，则 `Switch` 返回 `VarExpr(3)`，依此类推。For example, if `VarExpr(0)` is `True`, `Switch` returns `VarExpr(1)`, and if `VarExpr(0)` is `False` but `VarExpr(2)` is `True`, `Switch` returns `VarExpr(3)`, and so on. 如果未提供 `VarExpr` 参数，`Switch` 返回 `Nothing`。If you do not supply the `VarExpr` argument, `Switch` returns `Nothing`. > [!NOTE] > 自变量列表中的表达式可以包含函数调用。The expressions in the argument list can include function calls. 作为 `Switch` 调用的参数列表的一部分，Visual Basic 编译器将调用每个表达式中的每个函数。As part of preparing the argument list for the call to `Switch`, the Visual Basic compiler calls every function in every expression. 这意味着，如果参数列表中前面的表达式 `True`，则不能依赖于未调用的特定函数。This means that you cannot rely on a particular function not being called if an expression earlier in the argument list is `True`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `Switch` 函数返回与 city 名称匹配的语言名称。The following example uses the `Switch` function to return the name of a language that matches the name of a city. 它要求 `Off``Option Strict`。It requires that `Option Strict` be `Off`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#48)] 由于 命名空间还包含名为 的类，因此必须使用 命名空间限定对 `Switch` 函数的调用。Because the namespace also contains a class called , a call to the `Switch` function must be qualified with the namespace.
